document.full_text: federal reserve chairman ben bernanke on wednesday said the u.s. central bank could best ensure a strong dollar was by creating the conditions for strong economic fundamentals.
document.title: bernanke says strong dollar in u.s. and global interest
lines_and_colors: federal reserve chairman ben bernanke on wednesday said the u.s. central bank could best ensure a strong dollar was by creating the conditions for strong economic fundamentals.
